Sentencas: The compositions Ce0.80Sm0.2-xPrxO3 (x=0-0.12) were prepared through the citrate-nitrate method.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Pr and Sm co-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: The synthesized Pr3+ and Sm3+ co-doped ceria powders with different compositions were calcined at 600 degrees C for 3 h. Phase structure of the calcined powders was characterized by X-Ray diffraction (XRD) analysis.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Pr and Sm co-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: All the calcined samples were found to be ceria based solid solutions of fluorite type structures.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Pr and Sm co-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: The morphology examinations were carried out by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) analysis.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Pr and Sm co-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: Relative density of more than 91% of the theoretical can be achieved by sintering the Ce0.80Sm0.2-xPrxO2-delta pellets at 1400 degrees C for 6 h.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Pr and Sm co-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: The two-probe a.c. impedance spectroscopy was used to study the ionic conductivity of the doped ceria samples.
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Pr and Sm co-doped CeO2-based systems

Sentencas: The Ce0.80Sm0.08Pr0.12O1.90 composition showed the highest total ionic conductivity value which is 2.39 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Oxide ionic conductivity and microstructures of Pr and Sm co-doped CeO2-based systems
